header.line2: Winona State University | Data Science Major | Data Support Analyst - Fastenal

about.text: I am a Data Science student at Winona State University with a passion for analytics, visualization, and applied machine learning. I currently live in Winona, Minnesota.

skills: Python – Data analysis and visualization with Pandas and Matplotlib
SQL – Query optimization and database design
Power BI – Interactive dashboards and KPI reporting
Machine Learning – Model training using scikit-learn
